spells.name: Ant Haul
spells.description: Triples carrying capacity of a creature.

spells.name: Aspect of the Falcon
spells.description: Gives bonuses on Perception checks and ranged attacks.

spells.name: Bristle
spells.description: Trade natural armor bonus for a bonus on attacks with natural weapons.

spells.name: Call Animal
spells.description: Makes an animal come to you.

spells.name: Cloak of Shade
spells.description: Reduces effects of sun exposure and heat.

spells.name: Feather Step
spells.description: Ignore movement penalty in difficult terrain.

spells.name: Flare Burst
spells.description: As flare, but all creatures within 10 ft.

spells.name: Hydraulic Push
spells.description: Wave of water bull rushes an enemy.

spells.name: Negate Aroma
spells.description: Subject cannot be tracked by scent.
